body.p: In April 2004 the IFRIC published a draft Interpretation, D6 Multi‑employer Plans, which proposed the following guidance on how multi‑employer plans should apply defined benefit accounting, if possible:

li.p: The plan should be measured in accordance with IAS 19 using assumptions appropriate for the plan as a whole.
The plan should be allocated to plan participants so that they recognise an asset or liability that reflects the impact of the surplus or deficit on the future contributions from the participant.
